scripts.say: Experimental Armament Testing Grounds
I heard the concert went on for quite some time. Is everyone all rested and resupplied, nya?
No matter how excited you are about the performances, remember that you're here to test the new rigging, nya!
For the next phase, I'll have someone help explain... Saratoga from the Eagle Union, nya!
The magical girl idol, Sister Sara, has arrived!
Whether on the battlefield or on stage, I'll bewitch you with my magic! Good to see you, everyone~♪
To be honest, I wanted to bring my sister along, but unleashing the forbidden Sara Double Trouble against your experimental rigging would be overkill!
In other words, I'll be putting on a solo performance today...
Just kidding! Joining me will be Zed, from the Iron Blood, and Ayanami, from the Sakura Empire!
Sister Sara will be carefully checking the power of your new armaments, so look forward to it~♪
Oh, Lexington! I'm glad you could make it, even if it's just as a spectator~♪
Professionals are truly terrifying! Her every movement and mannerism is perfect, nya!
Heheh, isn't it about time we got this show on the road?
All right, let's start the music!
Recalibration based upon Saratoga's speech: Significant motivation differential detected between opponent and Polaris.
Didn't I say that pros shouldn't be allowed at this event...? Combat effectiveness aside, there's no way we can compete with her stage presence.
Correct. However, combat effectiveness and performing skills are not the only things that matter.
Sheffield...?
Do we have some alternate win condition...?
What should we do then?
We will take advantage of the moment the enemy's advantage seems insurmountable and...
Sheffield pulled her microphone cable taut.
If you can't muster your own momentum, then you'll have to turn the enemy's against them.
